giveaway.name: giveaway
giveaway.description: [moderation] Create and manage giveaways in the server

options.name: create
options.description: [moderation] Create a new giveaway

options.name: prize
options.description: Giveaway prize (2~150 characters)

options.name: duration
options.description: When does the giveaway end? (Ex: 1d 2h 3m) (Limit: 5 seconds to 2 years)

options.name: channel
options.description: Giveaway channel

options.name: winners
options.description: Number of winners (1~250)

options.name: requirements
options.description: What are the requirements for this giveaway

options.name: image
options.description: Giveaway image URL

options.name: color
options.description: Color of the giveaway embed

options.name: sponsor
options.description: Who is sponsoring the giveaway

options.name: account_days
options.description: Minimum number of account days

options.name: server_days
options.description: Minimum number of days in the server

options.name: list
options.description: [Moderation] List all giveaways

options.name: reroll
options.description: [Moderation] Reroll a giveaway

options.name: giveaway
options.description: Giveaway ID (Same as message ID)

options.name: winners
options.description: Number of winners (1-250)
